queries.select-single: SELECT books.id, books.isbn, title, authors.name, authors.country FROM books JOIN authors ON books.author_id = authors.id WHERE books.id=:id
queries.select-all: SELECT books.id, books.isbn, title, authors.name, authors.country FROM books JOIN authors ON books.author_id = authors.id
queries.size: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM books JOIN authors ON books.author_id = authors.id
